类 EditPHRAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.base.PatientBaseAction
      • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.EditPHRAction

  • public class EditPHRAction
extends PatientBaseAction
    Edits the patient health record for a given patient Used by editPHR.jsp
    作者:
    laurenhayward

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EditPHRAction

        public EditPHRAction(DAOFactory factory,
             long loggedInMID,
             java.lang.String pidString)
              throws iTrustException,
                     DBException
        Super class validates the patient id
        参数:
        factory - The DAOFactory to be used in creating DAOs for this action.
        loggedInMID - The MID of the currently logged in user who is authorizing this action.
        pidString - The MID of the patient whose personal health records are being added.
        抛出:
        iTrustException
        DBException
        NoHealthRecordsException

    • 方法详细资料

      • updateAllergies

        public java.lang.String updateAllergies(long pid,
                               java.lang.String description)
                                 throws iTrustException
        Adds an allergy to the patient's records
        参数:
        pid -
        description -
        返回:
        "Allergy Added", exception message, a list of invalid fields, or "" (only if description is null)
        抛出:
        iTrustException

      • doesFamilyMemberHaveHighBP

        public boolean doesFamilyMemberHaveHighBP(FamilyMemberBean member)
                                   throws iTrustException
        Checks to see if a particular family member has high blood pressure
        参数:
        member - the family member to check
        返回:
        true if the family member has high blood pressure. False if there are no records or the family member does not have high blood pressure
        抛出:
        iTrustException
